snippet: Detectives shared details of the mysterious case of Ramona Moore, after she made the rare transition from missing person to suspected murder victim without ever turning up.
abstract: Michael Wilson Crime Scene column; detectives share details of the mysterious 2012 case of Ramona Moore of the Bronx, after she made the rare transition from missing person to suspected murder victim without authorities finding a body; Nasean Bonie has been charged with second-degree murder.
lead_paragraph: Detectives shared details of the mysterious case of Ramona Moore, after she made the rare transition from missing person to suspected murder victim without ever turning up.

headline.main: With No Body, Police Sought Murder Clues Elsewhere
headline.print_headline: With No Body, Police Sought Murder Clues Elsewhere
